p.d: Prosecutor Paul Berthier is the only witness to the accidental drowning of a young girl. But the case looks like a crime which he must investigate. Guillaume Vauban, the victim's ex-boyfriend and the son of a local public figure, is soon arrested. Berthier keeps quiet and steps aside... Directed by: Marc Riviere (France, 2016) Screenplay by: Didier Decoin, based on the novel by Pierre Boulle Cast: Bruno Solo (Paul Berthier), Julia Faure (MÃ©lanie Florian), Hippolyte Girardot (Serge Vauban), Victor Pontecorvo (Guillaume Vauban), Florence Coste (Catoun Garrel) Genre: drama
